baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，以世俗伎術教授白衣，波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 170

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼教他治病以為生業。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 147

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。授俗人外道醫方者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 83
